question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: 스웨덴 웁살라의 중심은 어느 강변에 위치해 있나요?
answer: 스웨덴 웁살라의 중심은 퓌리스 강변에 위치해 있습니다.
answer_translated_eng: The centre of Uppsala, Sweden, is located on the banks of the Fjris River.
